title: A_TRIG Function Block
description:
A_TRIG monitors an input value on change and every time when the input
value changes by more than RES, the module generates an output pulse
for a cycle so that the new value can be processed. At the same time, the
device remembers the current input value with which it compares with the
input IN at the next cycle. At the output D the diference between IN and
the stored value is displayed.
name: A_TRIG

input.name: IN
input.description: The current input value to be evaluated.

input.name: RES
input.description: The threshold value for the change detection.

output.name: Q
output.description: Output indicating whether a significant change has occurred.

output.name: D
output.description: The calculated difference between the current input and the last input.
